import React,{ Component } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; export default class Blog extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { blog_post1 :[], news_list : [] }; } static defaultProps = { apiUrl : 'http://localhost/my-app1/' }; componentDidMount = async() =>{ const FormData = require('form-data'); const data = new FormData(); data.append('get_post', 'true'); data.append('post_id', '83'); const config = { method: 'post', url: this.props.apiUrl, headers: {}, data : data }; const make_post = await axios(config); this.setState({ blog_post1 : make_post.data }); /** */ const data2 = new FormData(); data2.append('get_posts', true); data2.append('post_type', 8); const config2 = { method: 'post', url: this.props.apiUrl, headers: {}, data : data2 }; const news_list = await axios(config2); const make_news = []; for(let key in news_list.data.data){ let row = news_list.data.data[key]; make_news.push({ id : row.id, title : row.title, featured : row.featured, excerpt : row.excerpt }); this.setState({ news_list : make_news }); } } render(){ const{blog_post1,news_list}=this.state; return(

{blog_post1.title}

{blog_post1.excerpt}
